programme.desc: Lion melayan kerenah Rizki bermain bunga api. Maria yang kekok beraksi di dapur ingin memasak turut di bantu soleha serta mr.google.

programme.title: Layan Karok Ep03
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan berbentuk nyanyian yang diselitkan dengan sketsa yang akan menghiburkan penonton di hujung minggu bersama dengan seorang penyanyi jemputan.

programme.title: Ragam Ep10
programme.desc: Kombinasi 5 sketsa pendek yang berlainan dan di lakonkan oleh artis artis yang berlainan. Setiap sketsa membawa tema, set up dan penceritaan yang berbeza mengenai ragam manusia.

programme.title: Oggy & the Cockroaches Ep13
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seekor kucing pemalas yang bernama Oggy. Dia suka menghabiskan hari-harinya dengan menonton televisyen dan makan. Tiga ekor lipas kecil, Joey, Marky dan Dee Dee suka menyerang peti sejuk Oggy

programme.title: Orang Ketiga S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Afifah, suri rumah hidup dalam kemewahan. Dia merasa hidupnya cukup sempurna, mempunyai seorang anak dan suami yang berkerjaya. Dia sering cemburu dan curiga pada perempuan muda, disekeliling suaminya.

programme.title: Diva Popular Ep18
programme.desc: Lola Kartika dan Dato Rona saling bermusuh. Sejarah berulang kembali apabila anak mereka, Ika Natela dan Erma Erika merebut Syahiwan Afil. Sekali lagi perang melanda diantara Lola Kartika dan Dato Rona!

programme.title: Silsila Badalte Rishton Ka Ep12
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Mauli dan Nandini. Suami Mauli, Kunal dan Nandini saling jatuh cinta. Nandini menjadi mangsa keganasan rumah tangga dia sering dipukul oleh suaminya Rajdeep.

programme.title: Anugerah Malam Ini Ep16
programme.desc: Rancangan bual bicara dengan konsep yang berbeza kerana dimulai dengan pemberian anugerah kepada tetamu jemputan dan dia akan ditemu bual oleh pengacara berkaitan dengan anugerah kemenangannya

programme.title: Hari Kita Jatuh Cinta Ep12
programme.desc: Farhan cuba membuka hatinya untuk Mariam. Julia dan Mariam masing-masing cuba menawan hati Farhan.

programme.title: The Last Empress Ep12
programme.desc: Sebelum Maharani balu Agung mendedahkan semua rahsia keluarga diraja di mesyuarat kecemasan, beliau ditikam mati dalam di bilik tidurnya. Pihak polis menyoal siasat setiap anggota keluarga diraja

programme.title: Click Ep224
programme.desc: Click is at the Hay literary festival in Wales. We speak to the writer of the book, Peter 2.0, a memoir about Motor Neurone Disease and combining his humanity with AI.

programme.desc: Director Chan Friend joins award-winning social satirist Alfred Cheung Kin Ting in this delightful variation on the hugely successful British Carry On!

programme.title: Legend of the Bat
programme.desc: Director Chor Yuen reunites with novelist, Gu Long, and superstar, Ti Lung, in this exciting sequel to Clans of Intrigue.

programme.title: The Story of Sue San
programme.desc: This compelling Shaw Brothers Huangmei Opera depicts the romance of star-crossed lovers the son of a respected government official and a famed prostitute.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A righteous man who can't fight and an unjustly wronged swordsman team up to battle against evil.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Inspired by Romeo and Juliet, this drama captures how a pair of young lovers, who are opposed by their families, eventually unite forever in death.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: After a kung-fu master (Lau Kar Leung) is crippled by a ruthless villain, he teaches a boy monkey kung-fu to avenge his shame.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A young woman, who has gone through life disguised as a boy, must deal with her family's pressure for her to marry and the love of another woman.

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This sequel depicts how the brothers of the Water Margin embark on a hunt for the thieves. Will they succeed and if so, at what cost?

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, this film marks the directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most respected figure, Chang Cheh.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A trio of heroes go up against a power-hungry Ming Dynasty official and also cross paths with three beauties.

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: Based on the real story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who runs his Chinese Opera Academy in the 1960s, where 3 young men train under Master Yu to become 3 Hong Kong's biggest stars.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Hong Kong Asian Film Festival's opening film by first-time producer, Carina Lau. When a youth who was abandoned by his mother meets a lonely teacher at school, they develop a strong bond.

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a happy plus-sized girl working as a mascot at a theme park. However, when a weight loss competition turns her into a vain internet icon, she begins to lose the people she loves.

programme.title: The Sleep Curse
programme.desc: After two cult classic films from the 90s - director Herman Yau & Anthony Wong reunite, and together with Gordon Lam, Michelle Wai & Jojo Goh, challenge your limit in this paranormal thriller.

programme.title: The Founding of an Army
programme.desc: This HKFA nominee tells the epic story behind the founding of the People's Liberation Army in China that ultimately laid the foundation for a new republic. Featuring 60 all-star cast members!

programme.title: When Sun Meet Moon
programme.desc: Shortlisted at the 8th Beijing International Film Festival, starring Kathy Yuen & Daichi Harashima. Two young astrology enthusiasts meet under the starry night during a massive power outage in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk, Dragon Return
programme.desc: Ji Gong forms an alliance with people from all walks of life to save humanity. Battle-hardened General Gao dare not marry his childhood sweetheart and turns to Ji Gong for help but things go awry.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Oscar winner Jean-Jacques Annaud pair up William Chan and Jelly Lin for their first collaboration to tell the story of Genghis Khan, who battles countless hardships en route to becoming the God of War.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: In this romance, a lady PR officer at a Macau casino & a real estate agent in California find themselves connected by destiny and a mysterious novel.

programme.title: Dragons Forever
programme.desc: Jackie Chan, Sammo Hung & Yuen Biao star in this film about a company lawyer, who struggles to make a decision when his employer's shady motives become clear.

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: When three runaways shack up in an abandoned general store, a supernatural correspondence connects them to many lives that were all touched by the owner of the store, years before they were born.

programme.title: Running Out of Time
programme.desc: A super thief, Andy who is dying, yet continues to plot his last jewel heist. In doing so, he arouses the suspicion of Sean, an inspector - but then, Sean learns the truth.

programme.title: Hotel Soul Good
programme.desc: After her boyfriend and job are stolen by her best friend, Mei Qi is hit by a fragment of a meteor, which gives her the ability to see three elderly spirits who need her help to fulfill their last wishes.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: Renowned conductor Yin Tze Long agrees to lead a pilot program training 3 underperforming school choirs to participate in an inter-school choral competition.

programme.title: Angels Sing
programme.desc: As a child, Michael wished every day could be Christmas. However, thirty years later, Michael can't muster any joy for the holidays, despite encouragement from his wife and parents.

programme.title: The Bbq

programme.title: House Arrest

programme.title: Swing Away

programme.desc: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he turns his son down for the last time.

programme.title: A Boy Called Po
programme.desc: After his wife dies of cancer, an overworked engineer struggles to care for his son with autism. His son in response to bullying regresses into a fantasy world escape.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep146
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep147
programme.desc: George finds a spider in the bathroom sink, but Peppa is really frightened-until she realizes that it doesn't want to hurt her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep148
programme.desc: Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep150
programme.desc: It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep152
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep202
programme.desc: It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam. Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it's home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep209
programme.desc: There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep210
programme.desc: George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Peppa's playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they can't see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Peppa's car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dog's garage isn't far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppa's car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep224
programme.desc: Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep227
programme.desc: The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep228
programme.desc: Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zoe. Zoe has a very special letter for Peppa and George, an invitation to her birthday party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep231
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she's not so keen on peddling uphill.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep232
programme.desc: Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep235
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called 'Gertrude' and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep237
programme.desc: Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbit's house today. It is a bit different to Peppa's house; it is inside a hill with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised
